spec_data.Name: perl-Dist-Zilla-Plugin-ReadmeAnyFromPod
spec_data.Description:
This Perl module generates a README for your Dist::Zilla-powered distribution
from its main_module in any of several formats. The generated README can be
included in the build or created in the root of your dist for e.g. inclusion
into version control.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 11:04:18 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Automatically convert POD to a README in any format for Dist::Zilla
